title: Virtual Marketing and Patient Support Assistant
job_overview:
About Us:
We are a physiotherapy clinic based in Ontario, Canada, specializing in hypermobility, movement dysfunction, and chronic pain. We receive direct referrals from physicians and educate our community through engaging digital content and evidence-based care. Our clinic maintains high standards of patient privacy and professional communication, both online and offline.
Role Summary
We are seeking a proactive and creative virtual assistant to support lead generation, patient scheduling, and multimedia marketing. You will help manage social platforms, guide leads toward bookings or newsletter sign-ups, and create visually appealing digital content for blogs, emails, and social channels. This is a patient-facing and content-support role requiring professionalism, attention to detail, and a willingness to learn new tools.

Key Responsibilities

?? Content Creation & Digital Marketing:
Create and schedule posts across TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, and X
Convert static content into engaging visual formats for posts, reels, or slideshows


Conduct keyword research to support blog SEO and video visibility


Support blog design: format posts with graphs, tables, visuals, and summaries


Use Canva (or similar tools) to design graphics for newsletters and posts


Conduct keyword research for SEO and content planning


Help execute email campaigns using platforms like Mailchimp, Omnisend, or Beehiiv


Follow and help build Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for repeatable content and communication workflows
?? Lead Generation & Client Communication:
Answer incoming phone calls to assist with questions, bookings, or rescheduling


Respond to social media leads (TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, X) and direct them to our website for booking or newsletter subscription


Manage patient bookings using software like Noterro


Reach out to referred patients to book initial sessions


Re-engage patients who dropped off or are due for reassessments


Track follow-up communication using CRM tools


Coordinate appointment reminders and updates
Ask satisfied patients for Google reviews or written testimonials


?? Administrative Support:
Oversee account receivables, including tracking outstanding payments and sending reminders


Track patient journeys, email follow-ups, and engagement metrics


Organize digital content libraries and SOPs


Coordinate social posts with content calendars and campaign goals


Required Skills
Excellent spoken and written English


Experience in virtual assistant, customer service, or healthcare support roles


Proficient with tools like Canva, Google Workspace, and scheduling platforms


Strong attention to detail, organized, and reliable


Comfortable learning and using platforms like Noterro, Mailchimp, Omnisend, and Beehiiv
Design skills for voiceover videos, slideshows, or blog visuals


SEO basics and content formatting knowledge


Experience using Meta Business Suite, Buffer, Later, or other scheduling tools



Understanding of and commitment to patient confidentiality, including compliance with PIPEDA and PHIPA privacy laws


Bonus (Assets, Not Required):
Prior work in healthcare, physio, or wellness industries


Experience editing videos or slides with voiceovers (CapCut, Canva, or similar)


Understanding of patient journey marketing and email funnels


Knowledge of SEO, keyword research, and blog formatting best practices


Work Terms
Hours: 40 hours/week 
Location: Remote
Pay: USD $110/week
Start Date: July 21, 2025
To Apply:
Send a brief message or video introducing yourself. Include:
Experience with social media, blog formatting, and healthcare clients (if any)
